entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening then becoming light near midnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill minus 53 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 30 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the evening. Blowing snow overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 in the evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
